description: Medialink Powerline Network Adapter KitExtend an existing wired internet connection for an laptop, computer, HDTV, game console or other Ethernet-enabled device, with data transfers up to 200Mbps. Stream video/music, Email, surf the web & more up to 300M away, without running more wiring. Its compact size won't block other outlets & a single button lets you quickly set up secure networks. A power saving mode cuts energy use to 0.5W.Product Features- Extend wired internet for an Ethernet device up to 300m (data transfers up to 200Mbps)- Quality of Service traffic prioritization for smooth performance- Compact build saves room without extra wiring- Power saving mode & troubleshooting LED's- Supports 128-bit AES encryption security for data protection- Protect devices with lightning-proof internalsSpecifications- Compliant with HomePlug AV IEEE802.3 & IEEE802.3u standards- Operating temp: 0C~40C- Storage temp: -40C~70C- Operating humidity: 10%~90%RH non-condensing- Storage humidity: 5%~90%RH non-condensing- Input: AC 100V-240V 50/60HzCompatibility- Ethernet-enabled devices with 10/100Mbps Auto-MDIX RJ45 ports- Works with Windows 8/7/Vista/XP/2000 & Mac OS XInstallationUsing the included cables, plug the 1st adapter into your router/cable modem & the 2nd into another device (adapters must be connected to outlets)Notes- At least 2 (& at most 10) adapters are required to start a Powerline network- These adapters can communicate with other manufacturers' adaptersPackage Contents- 2 x Powerline adapter- 2 x Ethernet cable (5FT)- 1 x Quick install guide- 1 x User guide/utility CDWarrantyLimited 1 Year WarrantySupportCall us Mon-Sat 9AM-6PM Eastern (extended hours Tue/Thu until 9PM). Emails answered within 1 business day
title: Medialink Powerline Network Adapter Kit (2 Units) - Ethernet Homeplug AV 200Mbps
